tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE image_geotags (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  gps_latitude FLOAT,
  gps_longitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ImageGeotags (
    geotag_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID,
    gps_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES ImageTimestamps(image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gps_id) REFERENCES GpsCoordinates(gps_id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_data (
   image_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   image_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   gps_latitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL,
   gps_longitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE image_mapping (
   mapping_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   image_id INT NOT NULL,
   tag_id INT NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES image_data(image_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES image_tags(tag_id)
);

CREATE TABLE image_keywords (
    image_id INT,
    keyword_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (image_id, keyword_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES image_metadata (image_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (keyword_id) REFERENCES keywords (keyword_id)
);
